name: Furniture Removal
description: Professional furniture removal service in South Florida. We haul away couches, mattresses, dressers, tables, chairs, and all types of household furniture.
commonQuestions: Can you remove furniture from upstairs?
What if my couch doesn't fit through the door?
disposal: We partner with Habitat for Humanity, Goodwill, and local furniture banks to donate usable pieces. Damaged furniture is recycled for materials recovery.
process: We'll assess your furniture, provide a quote, handle all lifting and loading, and ensure proper disposal or donation.

name: Appliance Removal
description: Same-day appliance removal and disposal in Palm Beach and Broward County. Refrigerators, washers, dryers, stoves, and more.
disposal: All appliances are taken to certified recycling facilities. Refrigerants are properly recovered per EPA guidelines. Metals, plastics, and electronics are separated for recycling.
process: We'll disconnect appliances safely (if needed), remove them from your home, and transport them to appropriate recycling facilities.

name: Mattress Disposal
description: Eco-friendly mattress and box spring removal in South Florida. Same-day pickup available. We recycle mattress components to keep them out of landfills.
commonQuestions: Do you remove mattresses from upstairs?
Can you take bed frames too?
What if my mattress is infested?
disposal: Mattresses are disassembled at recycling facilities. Steel springs are melted down, foam is repurposed for carpet padding, and fabric is processed into fiber.
process: We'll remove your mattress and box spring from anywhere in your home, wrap them for transport, and deliver them to specialized mattress recycling facilities.

name: Estate Cleanout
description: Compassionate, professional estate cleanout services in South Florida. We handle entire homes, apartments, and storage units with care and respect.
commonQuestions: How long does an estate cleanout take?
Can you help sort valuable items?
Do you work with executors and families?
disposal: We work with local charities, donation centers, and recycling facilities to minimize waste. Valuable items can be set aside for families. We handle everything with dignity and care.
process: We'll walk through the property with you, sort items for donation/disposal/keeping, handle all heavy lifting, and leave the space clean and ready.

name: Construction Debris
description: Construction debris removal for contractors and homeowners in South Florida. Drywall, lumber, tile, concrete, and renovation waste.
disposal: Metal, wood, and concrete are separated for recycling. Drywall goes to specialized facilities. We do NOT accept asbestos, lead paint, or hazardous waste.
process: We'll load all construction debris, separate recyclables, and haul everything to appropriate facilities. Perfect for renovation projects and contractor cleanups.

name: Hot Tub Removal
description: Professional hot tub and spa removal in Palm Beach and Broward County. We handle disconnection, demolition if needed, and complete removal.
commonQuestions: Do you disconnect plumbing and electrical?
Can you demo an in-ground spa?
How do you remove hot tubs from backyards?
disposal: Hot tubs are disassembled on-site. Acrylic shells are recycled, wood frames are processed as lumber, and electrical components are recycled as e-waste.
process: We'll disconnect utilities (or coordinate with your electrician), cut the tub into manageable sections if needed, remove all debris, and clean up the area.

name: Yard Waste Removal
description: Yard waste and landscaping debris removal in South Florida. Tree branches, brush, leaves, sod, and green waste hauling.
disposal: All yard waste goes to composting facilities or is processed into mulch. Nothing goes to landfills. Perfect for post-storm cleanup and landscaping projects.
process: We'll load all yard waste, including branches, leaves, and debris. Great for after landscaping work, tree removal, or storm cleanup.

name: Electronics Recycling
description: Certified electronics recycling and e-waste removal in South Florida. Secure data destruction and environmentally responsible disposal.
commonQuestions: Can you provide data destruction certificates?
disposal: All electronics go to R2-certified recycling facilities. Hard drives are wiped or destroyed. Precious metals, glass, and plastics are recovered. No e-waste goes to landfills.
process: We'll collect all electronics, provide secure data destruction if needed, and transport everything to certified e-waste recycling facilities.
